Reference

reshape map

convert map between “long” and “wide” format

cast_map()

convert a "long" map into a "wide" one

melt_map()

convert a "wide" map into a "long" one

qualify_map()

qualify a map to be "square"

as symbol

convert ID (accession) of other database to HUGO gene symbol

as_symbol_from_symbol() as_symbol_from_entrez() as_symbol_from_ensembl() as_symbol_from_genbank() as_symbol_from_entrez_or_symbol() as_symbol_from_unigene()

convert common gene ID (accession) to HUGO gene symbol
